source: • Da che tratta tieu cudesch? Resüma que cha tü hest let in trais frasas.
target: • Par tge va'gl agl tieus cudesch? Resumescha an tres construcziùns quegl ca tei âs ligieu.

source: 4. Eau d'he tschinch bisabiedgias chi staun in Grischun.
target: 4. Jou ve tschentg sutbieadis ca statan agl Grischùn.

source: p.ex. a la staziun, a la plazza aviatica, contact cun passagers esters
target: p.ex. a la staziùn, a la plaza aviatica, contact cun passaschiers easters
